prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Narrator
mes:
Oliver sits at his usual seat outside the little cafe near Elisabethplatz Market. He's working on wrapping up another composition for his latest album, Midgard. He's got two pieces written so far, If he can wrap this one up, then he will have the third.

 He looks up as he takes a drink and sees her sitting there again in the same spot she was yesterday and the day before and the day before that the girl with the dragon tattoo, and the captivating smile.

Will curiosity get the best of him? or will his work win out? or even perhaps that burlesque dancer and fashion designer he's been hooking up with? Friends with benefits, of course. Gina's a dark chocolate piece of ass, and nothing more. . . but she is a good one.

Will curiosity get the best of him? or will his work win out? or even perhaps that burlesque dancer and fashion designer he's been hooking up with? Friends with benefits, of course. Gina's a dark chocolate piece of ass, and nothing more. . . but she is a good one.
